From the brand

TOOL DAILY

Tool Daily has accumulated abundant manufacturing experience in the past 20 years and possess our own factory.

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

Adjustable Snow Foam Lance with 1/4″ quick connection fitting. Container Capacity: 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon. Specification: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI.
EASY to install: fill some soap into the bottle with warm water to get thick foam; Then connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to Pressure Washer Gun or Wand. Finally, adjust the knob on the top to desired foam level and then foam sprayer will disperse thick foam. The knob adjusts the foam dispensing amount and the nozzle adjusts the sprinkle pattern.
Adjustable nozzle for accurate mixing and foam generation. Turn the top knob right (-) to get the thickest mixture, adjust the nozzle to get a proper sprinkle pattern, and let it loose.
5 Nozzle Tips have different angle (0, 15, 25, 40, 65 degree). Choose different nozzle according to the actual need. Such as watering flowers and plants, washing car. They also can be attached to a Quick-Connect Wand for swifter application and more.
Application: ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Tool Daily: The Great Brand for Pressure Washer Accessory

Tool Daily are committed to developing more efficient and safer pressure washer accessory, helping people reducing the tiredness of spraying and cleaning in the garden. We are known for amazing pressure washer accessory, such as nozzle, wand, gun, coupler, foam cannon.

Feature

  • Universal foam cannon with 1/4″ quick disconnection fits almost all pressure washer.
  • Adjustable foam cannon can mix cleaning fluid with water accurately and generate foam quickly.
  • The bottle can be filled in with 1 Liter cleaning fluid. Spray angle and suction amount of cleaning fluid can be adjusted according to needs.
  • It is used to wash motorcycle, car, roofs, driveways, siding, floors and windows.
  • Working Condition: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI
  • Max Temperature: 60℃ / 140℉.
  • Bottle Capacity: 1L.
  • PACKAGE INCLUDE
  • 1 X Foam cannon
  • 1 X Red Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (0 Degree)
  • 1 X Yellow Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (15 Degree)
  • 1 X Green Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (25 Degree)
  • 1 X White Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (40 Degree)
  • 1 X Brass soap nozzle tip (65 Degree)

Read more

How to Install Foam Cannon

Step 1. Fill some soap into the bottle with warm water. The foam cannon’s bottle is graduated and can hold 1000 ml.

Step 2. Connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to pressure washer gun or wand.

Step 3. Adjust the knob to desired foam level and then it disperses thick foam.

Read more

Ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX : Powered by the latest AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor(8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16M Cache, up to 4.60GHz), Radeon RX Vega 8 integrated graphics(up to 2100 MHz). 8 cores and 16 threads to divide and conquer multiple tasks at once.
RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 3200MHz dual channel RAM(upgradable to 64 GB), 512GB M.2 2280 PCle 3.0 SSD, performed multiple tasks with faster response speed and multi-threaded sensitive response. 2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot x2 for future expansion as your need.
Video Outputs & Liquid Metal Boosts Cooling: With four video output interfaces—HDMI (4K@60Hz) x2, and DisplayPort(4K@60Hz)x2. You can drive four independent 4K 60Hz displays for extreme productivity. Elevates performance with a premium liquid metal compound on the CPU, features direct CPU contact, a wide degree of open ventilation, and a smart fan that efficiently spins up when required to effectively transfer heat directly out the system for quiet and cool performance.
Strong Connectition: 1 x RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 5 x USB 3.0 Ports(Gen1) , 1 x USB-C Port, 1 x Clear CMOS , 2 x HDMI Ports, 2 x Display Ports, 2 x MIC, 2 x LINE OUT. WiFi 6, BT 5.1. Enough to connect various devices to meet various application scenarios.
Package & Other Functions: 1x HX90 Mini PC, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Power Adapter, 1x Instruction Manual. Functions: RTC wake up / Wake on Lan / Auto Power on / Network boot.24/7 Support, professional technical team.

It is 100% brand new,Precise laser cut tempered glass, exquisitely polished,0.33mm ultra-thin tempered glass screen protector maintains the original response sensitivity and touch, bringing you a good touch experience.
Easiest Installation – Please watch our installation video tutorial before installation.Removing dust and aligning it properly before actual installation,no worrying about bubbles,enjoy your screen as if it wasn’t there.

Best Sellers Rank #7,803 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics)
#28 in Car Audio Receivers
Date First Available November 3, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $119.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:48:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SjoyBring M005 7 Inch Double Din Car Stereo

M005 Double Din Car Stereo features with a 7-inch capacitive touch screen, a user-friendly interface and modern functions design for your comfort and entertainment during driving trip.

From listening to FM AM Radio, casting the map navigating from your phone to big screen, keeping your passengers enjoy a movie in the trip, taking Bluetooth hands-free phone calls and even parking your car safely and fast, M005 car stereo will be your best driving partner!

Easy DIY installation, compatible with most car models7 inch HD LCD monitor, With Resolution 1024*600Compatible with Android and IOS phones for Mirror-LinkSupports Front/rear view camera video Input and Video outputBluetooth hands-free calling and audio streamIncludes rear camera, wireless remoteUSB for fast phone charging Built-in 16-band EQ settingsStylish 7 color Led buttonsSupports Steering Wheel ControlPre-amp & subwoofer outputsWorking Voltage: DC 12V; Max power output: 4x 60watt

Safer Parking

Our reversing rear camera adopts BMW interface, can make the connection more secure, more stable, simpler, much better than similar products.

Easy operation and wiring, easy operation and help driver a safe and easier parking.

Package includes an HD rear camera with night vision, a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle and a full waterproof design. The JOY-M005 was designed having your safety and comfort in mind, supporting rear and front view camera with an automatic display of image when in reverse.

Mirror Link for Android & IOS

Compatible with Android phones and IOS phones (No version limit). The function allows you to cast what’s displayed on your phone to the car stereo screen via original USB interface, easily realize map navigation, watch movies, etc.

Please Note:

1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function.

2. Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.

Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-clear MIC

With the updated Bluetooth 5.2, which is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, you can take and make calls in seconds by pairing it with your smartphone. Listen to your favorite music services and apps with the wireless Bluetooth audio stream, control tracks, volume and play / pause with a simple touch of a button.

Ultra-clear built-in microphone, hassle-free noise when making a phone call, so you can make a phone call easily while focusing on the road.

Full HD Capacitive Touchscreen

During driving, your family and friends can watch the TV show or movies with this multifunctional car radio which features a highly sensitive TFT HD capacitive touchscreen.

7 inch HD LCD capacitive monitor with resolution 1024 X 600, supports 1920 X 1080P and most video / audio file formats. Keep kids busy watching cartoons during long rides, watch your favorite TV show or movie with this MP5 player.

FM/AM Radio & Memory Function

FM: 87.5 MHz -107.9 MHz and AM: 52 KHz -1620 KHz radio frequency enables you to receive signal messages more reliably. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.

With this car radio you can enjoy stable reception, clear sound and a switchable tuner function even on the highway or in bad weather. Listen to your favorite radio shows in Europe, the USA and South America.

Steering Wheel Control

You can use the vehicle’s steering wheel buttons to answer and end calls, play music, switch modes and much more, all of which make your journey more comfortable.

Simply connect the SWC cable of your vehicle to the key1 or key2 cable of this device. Follow the instructions to learn the keys.

Note: If the SWC is a digital signal output (controlled by CANBUS), you will need to buy an SWC adapter that can convert digital signals to analog signals.

16-Band EQ Audio Setting

The car audio system- high sound quality experience for you

With a built-in preset EQ and user customized 16-band EQ options, this multimedia system is ideal for a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. Crystal clear sound and easily adjustable volume for the complete experience.

Subwoofer Output

Pre-Amp and Subwoofer outputs allow you to expand your system by adding up to 2 amps and/or signal processors. Easily enhance your sound from your speakers and make sure no sound distortion at the maximum volume.

Subwoofer Output make it possible to provide seamless and smooth sound characteristics with dynamic, high impact bass that lets you hear and feel the music.

Stylish LED Buttons & Physical Buttons

7 colors that change automatically with the possibility of setting a unique one of your choice and a stylish design for the LED buttons of this multimedia system!

Physical buttons, especially the rotating volume control that makes it easier to use while driving.

Important tips before ordering

1. JOY-M005 is standard size fits most brands of car models, but it’s also recommended to make sure if your dash board opening size is one of the following three sizes (No matter amazonconfirmedfit shows your vehicle model fits or not), if yes, our stereo can match your car perfectly:

Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173*98mm(6.81*3.86inch)- standard size commonly used by some Ford, Lincoln, and Chevrolet. (Note: not include all, some car models are of special size, need to purchase frame installation)Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the Asian: 178*100mm(7*4inch)-standard size commonly used by some of Nissan, Hyundai, KIA and Honda. (Note: not include all , some car models are special size, need to purchase frame installation)Other common sizes: 190*116mm(7.48*4.57inch)

2. If your DASH BOARD opening size is not the above three, then you need to buy a double din DASH KIT that fits your car model.

The brand installation DOUBLE DIN DASH KIT opening size is 173(W)×98MM(H) (Metra, PAC, Scosche, etc.) that can match with our stereo perfectly or modify your dashboard when you install the stereo.

3. Some cars may also require two additional accessories to complete the installation:

Wire harness adapter for your car model. ( Used to transfer your factory harness and ISO stereo wiring harness)Radio antenna adapter for your car model.

4. The head unit has a memory function. If the ACC wire (red wire) and the B+ wire (yellow wire) are connected reversely during the installation, the product will have no memory function after the power is off.

5. The working voltage of this car stereo is 12V, it can’t be used for large trucks with 24V, and the car stereo will be damaged when the voltage is over 16V.

6. This car stereo does Not CarPlay or android auto function.

【Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-Clear MIC】The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, enables wireless streaming of music, calls, MP3 players and more. The built-in ultra-clear microphone realize clearer calls and more accurate voice control, never distract you from driving, ensure safer driving.
【Mirror Link for Android and iOS Phones】 The double din car stereo supports IOS & Android phone (no version limit) for mirror link function, mirror the screen of your smartphone and show Google Maps, Spotify, Youtube etc. in the car radio. Replacing the cell phone with a car screen to realize vehicle intelligence. (Please Note: 1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function. 2.Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.)
【Free reversing camera】The car radio supports the rear and front view and will display the image automatically when the vehicle shifts into reverse. HD night vision rear view camera is included, ultra-wide viewing angle of 170 ° and a fully waterproof design, helps to park more safely and easily.
【7 Inch Full Touch HD Capacitive Screen】 Functions with 1024 X 600 resolution 7 inch HD touch screen, support 1920 X 1080P video playback. High resolution screen quality, full capacitive touch screen for more sensitive and accurate operation. Physical buttons make it easier to use while driving, especially the rotating volume control.
【FM/AM Radio with Memory Function】 With FM radio that transmission power range is wider, signal coverage is wider, and more stations can be received, your journey is no longer boring. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.
【Important Tips】1. Please make sure if your dash board opening size fits our car stereo. If you find that our stereo size does not meet your dash size, please purchase a suitable dash kit. 2.Please read the instructions before installation and it is recommended to install at a professional car audio shop. 3. Some cars may also require two additional after accessories to complete the installation: Wire harness adapter and radio antenna adapter for your car model.
【Check Dash Board Size Fits】 No matter the garage search shows your vehicle model fits our car stereo or not, please read our stereo size carefully and measure your dashboard size, if the dimensions match one of the following three sizes, then our stereo will fit your model: ①Commonly used sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173×98mm(6.81×3.85inch); ②Commonly used sizes for car series in the Asian: 178×100mm(7×4inch); ③Other common sizes:190×116mm(7.48×4.56inch).
Ideal gift for special day like birthday, Father’s Day or Christmas, Thanksgiving Day.

3. Some cars may also require two additional accessories to complete the installation:

  • Wire harness adapter for your car model. ( Used to transfer your factory harness and ISO stereo wiring harness)
  • Radio antenna adapter for your car model.

4. The head unit has a memory function. If the ACC wire (red wire) and the B+ wire (yellow wire) are connected reversely during the installation, the product will have no memory function after the power is off.

5. The working voltage of this car stereo is 12V, it can’t be used for large trucks with 24V, and the car stereo will be damaged when the voltage is over 16V.

6. This car stereo does Not CarPlay or android auto function.

3.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:48:39 UTC – Details)

item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

GS Power Wire Loom – 1/4 Inch x 50 Ft Split Cable Sleeves for Industrial Electrical Wires – High Temperature Cable Conduit
Our practical split cable wrap protects multiple wires for easy cable management.
This cable sleeve measures 1/4” x 50ft and is crafted from high-density polyethylene.
This versatile wire wrap is engineered for automotive, marine, industrial, office and home use.
The flexible ribbed wire loom tubing is designed for easy installation and cleaning.
Our wire protector tubing is resistant to oil, gasoline, abrasions, and temperatures ranging from –40F to 200F.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);

var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Product Description

Elecsung- Design for a Better Life

With Elecsung superior range of waterproof bathroom TVs, add a touch of contemporary luxury to your bathroom and enjoy unlimited entertainment in your shower or bath. Elecsung TVs offer stunning picture quality and intelligent features and functions, designed and tested to be waterproof and safe for the whole family to use. Elecsung TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don’t feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Why Waterproof TV?

Imagine this: luxuriating in a steamy, bubbly bathtub with a glass of wine while watching your favorite TV show. However, making this addition does require special considerations. Choose a waterproof TV, and you’ll have no worries.

Features of 2022 Model Elecsung Waterproof Television

Full Screen Touch Control Option

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

7 Touch Keys

If you don’t want to choose full screen touch control, then the TV with touch keys

On desk option

Except on-wall and in-wall installation, base stand option for on-desk

Key Features

• 22″ LED Magic Mirror Screen (Flat Panel)

• Bright Single-sided Transmissive Mirror, Super Narrow Border

• 1080P Full HD Resolution

• 7 Touch Keys for TV Control, Full Screen Touch Control (Optional)

• Built-in Bluetooth, WiFi and Speakers, TV, HMDI, USB and WLAN Inputs

• Earphone and COAX/Optical Audio Outputs, 2 x 5W Stereo Speakers (Waterproof)

• Waterproof and Dustproof (IP66) , Waterproof Remote Control (IP66)

• Full View Angle (178º/178º)

• VESA Holes Available (100mm x 100mm)

Invisible Mirror

Nano high transparent crystal mirror surface

New Magic Mirror Experience

IP66 waterproof, anti-fog and dustproof

Remote Control

Waterproof remote control with holder

Serial Number

Each TV has its serial number, it won’t be repeated.

Installation

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket
